Let's break it down line by line and discuss the key Angular concepts that are being used. ```csharp ``` This is a component that displays toast notifications to the user. The `type` attribute specifies the type of notification (in this case, a toast). The `#toastNotification` creates a reference to the component, which can be used in the component's controller code. The `[overrideToastPositionTop]` attribute is a property binding that allows the position of the toast notification to be overridden. ```php
``` This is a loading indicator that is displayed while data is being loaded. The `[hidden]` attribute is a property binding that hides the loading indicator when the `hideLoadingIndicator$` observable emits a value of `true`.
